mapper.select: select id, title, mdcontent, htmlcontent, summary, uid, publishdata, state, pageview, likecount from turingblog.blog where id = #{id}
select id, title, mdcontent, htmlcontent, summary, publishdata, state, pageview, likecount from turingblog.blog where uid = #{userId}
select id, title, mdcontent, htmlcontent, summary, uid, publishdata, state, pageview, likecount from turingblog.blog by rand()
select id, title, mdcontent, htmlcontent, summary, uid, publishdata, state, pageview, likecount from truringblog.blog where title like #{key};

select a.id, a.title, a.mdcontent, a.htmlcontent, a.summary, a.uid, a.publishdata, a.state,a.pageview, a.likecount from turingblog.blog a inner join turingblog.category cate inner join turingblog.blog-category bc on a.id = bc.bid and bc.cid = cate.id where cate.categoryname like #{key}
mapper.insert: insert into turingblog.blog(title, mdcontent, htmlcontent, summary, uid, publishdata, state, pageview, likecount) values (#{title}, #{mdContent}, #{htmlContent}, #{summary}, #{uid}, #{publishData}, #{state}, #{pageView}, #{likeCount})
